h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Weaver's Needle Location
content: Vessels are one of the many items you can find scattered around the game across its chapters. For even more guides on some of the rarer materials, be sure to check out our guides on the Blood of the Iron Bull Locations, Mind Core Locations, Awaken Wine Worm Locations and Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations.

The content is as follows:
Vessels are one of the many items you can find scattered around the game across its chapters. For even more guides on some of the rarer materials, be sure to check out our guides on the Blood of the Iron Bull Locations, Mind Core Locations, Awaken Wine Worm Locations and Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations.
